about_the_game:
Welcome to WobblePop, the bubbly underwater adventure made just for kids! Tap and pop colorful bubbles to score points, but watch out for those wiggly, mischievous fish trying to get in your way. With its bright colors, cheerful sounds, and easy-to-use controls, WobblePop is the perfect game for kids who love fun challenges. How many bubbles can you pop before the fish make things tricky? Dive in and find out!

In WobblePop, you can unlock three adorable underwater buddies to help you on your bubble-popping adventure! Meet Poppy the Pufferfish, a bouncy friend who cheers you on with every pop. Then there's Snippy the Shrimp, quick and playful, ready to boost your game with a burst of energy. Finally, Sharky the Shark, the king of the sea, swims by your side to protect you from those pesky fish. Unlock all three buddies and let them join you for even more bubbly fun!

Don't forget to grab the special Magnet Power-Up during your adventure! This magical power pulls in nearby bubbles, making it easier to pop them and rack up big points. With the help of your underwater buddies and the magnet power-up, you'll be unstoppable in your quest for the highest score. Get ready to pop, dodge, and splash your way to underwater glory in WobblePop!

name: WobblePop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core I3-6100
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 970
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek ALC887
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Core I7-1165
  • Graphics: Intel R Iris R Xe
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek R

short_description: WobblePop: Pop bubbles, dodge silly fish, and dive into colorful underwater fun!
